concept.title: Vendor management
concept.shortdesc: With more and more people involved in a translation process, TMS helps you manage all of them effectively.

conbody.p: Even though TMSs automate a lot of tasks, they still require humans to manage workflows, translate and review texts, and configure the system. After all it is a system for gathering all project participants in one place.

To streamline TMS operations, you should manage your vendors in a structured and efficient way so that all parties are satisfied with this cooperation and bring your translation process to the next level.
